text: A brisk, charming comedy that left me smiling long after the credits rolled.
Despite a promising cast, the film collapses under meandering pacing and shallow character arcs that never earn the big emotional swings it keeps telegraphing.

The documentary starts as a heartfelt love letter to the local music scene, weaving archival footage with earnest interviews, but the second half turns into a repetitive lecture that drains the energy and leaves the finale feeling oddly hollow despite the triumphant soundtrack.
